examplePhrases: Alexa, ask JIRA-X the status of ABC 123
Alexa, tell JIRA-X to update ABC 537 to Complete
Alexa, tell JIRA-X to move ABC 5-3-7 to In Progress
en-US.name: JIRA-X
en-US.description: JIRA-X (pronounced JEE-RUH X) allows a developer to get that status of and update JIRA issues quickly without the additional hassle of opening the site and finding the appropriate issue.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
1) TBD: Connect to JIRA
2) Ask Alexa: "Ask JIRA-X the status of A.B.C. 123"
(JIRA-X is pronounced "jeeruh X")
